data.title: Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2 Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Peacock
data.meta_description: Looking to catch Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2? Here's how you can watch and stream the show online and catch the episodes.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2 is here to continue the exciting yet productive journey of the adorable Maya and her buddies. The show rolled out a second season due to the craze of the first installment. It aired from August 29, 2013 to September 10, 2013.

Here’s how you can watch and stream Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2 via streaming services such as Peacock.

Is Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2 available to watch via streaming?

Yes, Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2 is available to watch via streaming on Peacock.

The second season keeps viewers engaged with a total of 26 episodes. The first episode of season 2 showcases Maya befriending a Hoverfly. The wasps steal the honey and Maya decides to retrieve it with the help of Syrphie.

The series has an ensemble voice cast of Zalina Sanchez, Hans-Jurgen Dittberner, Ben Hadad, Sonja Deutsch, Lukas Till Berglund, Axel Lutter, and many others.

Watch Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2 streaming via Peacock

Maya the Bee (2013) Season 2 is available to watch on Peacock.

Peacock is a streaming platform that provides a wide range of entertainment options, including movies, TV shows, news, sports, and original programming.

You can watch via Peacock by following these steps:

Go to PeacockTV.com

Click ‘Get Started’

Choose your payment plan

$5.99 per month or $59.99 per year (premium)

$11.99 per month or $119.99 per year (premium plus

Create your account

Enter your payment details

Peacock’s Premium account provides access to over 80,000+ hours of TV, movies, and sports, including current NBC and Bravo Shows, along with 50 always-on channels. Premium Plus is the same plan but with no ads (save for limited exclusions), along with allowing users to download select titles and watch them offline and providing access to your local NBC channel live 24/7.

Maya the Bee (2013) synopsis is as follows:

”Hello everyone, I’m Maya the Bee! What do I love? Freedom! That’s why I live in the meadow instead of the hive. I have a thousand and one adventures with my friends: Shelby Snail, Max the Worm… and of course Willy! Willy is very lazy and greedy … But he’s my best friend. Together, we go on many adventures! Let’s go!”

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
